title: Man arrested over bomb hoax threat after jets escort Qatar Airways plane - as it happened | UK news | The Guardian
summary: nothing sus on diverted plane , say police .
qatar airways confirms possible device on board .
qatar airways passenger arrested over suspected bomb hoax .

text: a man has been arrested by armed police on a qatar airways plane at manchester airport after military jets were scrambled to escort it following a hoax bomb threat on board .

a royal air force typhoon escorted flight qr23 , an airbus a330-300 carrying 269 passengers and 13 crew from doha to manchester , after the pilot was alerted to a possible device on board.. a police source told the guardian that on a sliding scale , we think we may be looking at an idiot rather than an international terrorist '' in relation to the arrested man , 47 , from north west england .
nothing sus was found on the flight when it was searched at manchester airport , police confirmed..
fellow passengers said they saw the man disappear for about 20 minutes before returning to his seat and speaking to cabin crew .
one witness said he heard a member of cabin staff tell the man : it 's a criminal offence '' .
another passenger , dennis firth , 51 , told the guardian : the man looked very calm .
it was only when the typhoon started following us that i looked at him and his face looked a bit like 'oh shit ' . `` .
dramatic and video were posted on twitter by passengers of the diverted aircraft as it was escorted mid-air by raf fighter jets .
one passenger said he was shaken up '' by the incident as another said he was worried and nervous about the whole thing '' .

documents.title: nothing sus on diverted plane , say police
text: the diverted qatar airways plane has been searched and nothing sus has been found , greater manchester police said .
a 47-year-old man remains in police custody on sus of making a hoax bomb threat .
chief superintendent john o'hare , said : today 's incident at the manchester airport has received widespread coverage and interest so it is right we update everybody .
we can confirm the incident is over and it 's business as usual at the airport .
the incident arose when the pilot received information about a possible device on board the plane having been handed a note from a passenger .
as a result a full emergency activation commenced that involved the aircraft being escorted in by the raf before specialist officers boarded and subsequently made an arrest .
a 47-year-old man from the north west has been arrested on sus of making a bomb hoax and remains in police custody for questioning .
a full search of the aircraft has now finished and nothing sus was found .
my colleagues helen pidd and dominic smith have sent this : aurange zab , 60 , from bradford , was also on board .
he said : when we landed we waited there for over an hour .
i saw police with guns and everything .
some people were scared .
there was a rumour that there was a bomb on the plane , but they have n't really told us anything .
meanwhile zab 's son , waqqar ahmed , 31 , was nervously waiting at manchester airport for news .
i was telling my dad what i 'd heard on the radio .
we knew more than they knew on the plane , which just added to the confusion of the whole thing . ''

zab , who had been on holiday in qatar , thought the guy who was arrested was an asian man in his 20s with a mohawk haircut , wearing a green t-shirt , but he could n't see very well because he was at the back of the plane and the suspect was near the front .
i thought something was wrong .
maybe there was a bomb threat or whatever .
i saw a plane flying so near to us and then police with guns .
there were kids crying and some people looking very worried .
people were saying that it could be a bomb .
armed police came on and said to 'put your hands up ' .
but even after he 'd got off the plane people were still worrying that he could have left something behind .

more from my colleagues helen pidd and dominic smith at manchester airport : one witness said the bomb hoax suspect disappeared for 20 minutes before returning to his seat and talking to a member of cabin crew , one of whom is said to have told him : it 's a criminal offence '' .
jackie clifton , 52 , was sitting across the aisle from the arrested man .
she said : he sat very quietly throughout the whole flight and then when we started the descent he disappeared for maybe 20 minutes .
when he came and sat down a member of the cabin crew came and talked to him and i could hear them saying to him , 'it 's a criminal offence ' .
i did n't see him pass a note to anyone , but that 's what some of the other passengers were saying afterwards .
her partner , dennis firth , 51 , said : the man looked very calm .
it was only when the typhoon started following us that i looked at him and his face looked a bit like 'oh shit ' .
they left him sitting there with us all until we landed and armed police came on and told him to put his hands above his head and marched him off . ''
the couple now live in australia and were returning to the uk to see family .

things are getting eventful for my colleague helen pidd : helen pidd ( @ helenpidd ) just got threatened with arrest for talking to families meeting loved ones from the qatari airlines flight inside manchester airport .
helen pidd ( @ helenpidd ) the officer would n't tell me under which law i was being threatened with arrest .

my colleagues helen pidd and dominic smith have sent this from manchester airport : a police source has told the guardian that on a sliding scale , we think we may be looking at an idiot rather than an international terrorist '' in relation to the arrested man .
families waiting at arrivals are angry at the lack of information at the airport .
one man , dave woodward , said he had been waiting for three hours for his 18-year-old daughter .
he added : it 's an absolute disgrace .
we 've not been given any information .
apparently they were told they could wait for their luggage to be re-scanned or go home without it and have it sent on .

an interesting little aside from press association following the bomb hoax , which now appears to have been dealt with by police : one of the flights that landed on time at manchester once the emergency was over was the plane carrying manchester united back from florida , where the team has been engaged in a pre-season friendly tournament .
manchester airport said nine incoming flights had to be diverted to other airports , with five of these landing at leeds bradford airport .
another passenger , matthew qox , told the bbc he was a bit worried , nervous about the whole thing '' and said he had been kept in the dark by qatar airways .
on the arrested man , he said : armed police came on and found a guy , searched him and made him stand up with his hands on his head and took him off the plane .
he seemed no different to others on the plane , nothing unusual .
qox said he found out about the incident through twitter : i was asleep and had no idea that we were being followed by an raf typhoon .
we stopped at the end of the runway and i found out what was going on by looking at twitter .
i wish we could have been kept in the loop .
at least it 's all a hoax , it could have been a lot worse .
i 'm a bit worried , nervous about the whole thing .
i do n't feel too worried now i 'm off the plane , it 's calmed me down i suppose .
a man is escorted off a qatar airways aircraft by police at manchester airport .
yates/reuters
here 's a summary of the latest developments : a qatar airways plane was escorted into manchester airport by an raf jet after its crew received a threat about a possible device on board .
the qr23 flight from doha to manchester arrived safely at 1.15pm after being escorted by a fighter jet from raf coningsby in lincolnshire .
a passenger has been arrested on sus of making a hoax bomb threat .
the man was escorted from the diverted plane by armed police before the airport was re-opened .
eyewitnesses tweeted and video of the dramatic raf escort .
one passenger said he was shaken up '' by the incident as another said he was worried and nervous about the whole thing .

documents.title: qatar airways passenger arrested over suspected bomb hoax
text: a man pulled from a qr23 flight at manchester airport has been arrested on sus of making a hoax bomb threat , a spokesman for greater manchester police said .
g m police ( @ gmpolice ) a man who was onboard the plane at @ twitterid has been arrested on sus of making a hoax bomb threat .

documents.title: qatar airways confirms possible device on board
text: qatar airways has confirmed that its crew received a threat about a possible device on board '' the doha to manchester flight before it was escorted by an raf jet into manchester airport .

in a statement , the airline said : qatar airways can confirm that flight qr23 from doha to manchester , an airbus a330-300 , landed safely at manchester airport ahead of its scheduled arrival time of 13:15 .
there were 269 passengers and 13 qatar airways crew on board .
the crew onboard had received a threat about a possible device on board and qatar airways immediately took all the necessary precautions to alert british authorities .
the crew is now fully assisting police at the airport with their inquiries .
the safety and well-being of our passengers and crew is our top priority .
as this is a matter of a police investigation , we can not comment further at this time .
greater manchester police has now confirmed that one passenger has been removed from the plane .
g m police ( @ gmpolice ) a passenger has been taken off the plane by officers at @ twitterid .
we will work to get others off as swiftly and safely as possible .
the qatar airways plane has been moved to an isolated part of manchester airport while police deal with the ongoing situation .
one passenger , named as josh hartley , who videoed the jet from onboard the plane , told the bbc passengers had not been told what was going on .
the first they knew about the incident was when they saw the jet flying alongside them , he said : when the escort came it was pretty scary .
i 'm pretty shook up now he said passengers had been sitting on the plane in the tarmac for around 40-50 minutes and had been told to remain seated .
one guy had been escorted off the plane already by armed police .
he said they had been given no information about what was happening by cabin crew .
i found out what was happening on twitter '' .
at first we were circling around airport for around 10 minutes , then the fighter jet came up for about eight to ten minutes .
then we came in for landing .
he told bbc news there were armed guards outside , but he could not see activities from his side of the plane .
he said the mood onboard was pretty calm all the way through '' but that some people are shaken up .
i 'm a bit shaken up '' .
he said the plane was parked up somewhere , and it looked as if passengers were about to be able to get off .
another passenger has tweeted a of a man appearing to be escorted off the plane by police at manchester airport : matthew qox ( @ mattpeterc ) @ bbcbreaking police escort
this video from a passenger on-board the plane shows the aircraft being escorted by an raf jet : video from plane
the aircraft has landed and the airport is now back to normal '' a manchester airport spokesman has said .
one passenger has tweeted this showing several police vehicles near the plane on the runway : josh hartley ( @ joshhartley ) @ bbcnwt
a number of eyewitnesses have tweeted of the qatar airways plane being escorted by an raf jet .
anthony grice ( @ mrtonygrice ) i 'm at manchester airport & just watched a fighter jet tailing a passenger aeroplane !
looked like a qatar airline !

william service ( @ williamservice ) just seen a passenger plane being escorted by a fighter jet to manchester airport robert whittaker ( @ rob whittaker1 ) very strange seeing the passenger plane being escorted by a fighter plane , dangerously close as well .
@ twitterid and this tweet from a man purporting to be a passenger on-board the qatar airways plane : josh hartley ( @ joshhartley ) being escorted in
an incoming plane has been escorted into manchester airport by a royal air force jet because of fears a device may be on board .
greater manchester police said the raf involvement came as a result of information received by the pilot about a possible device on board '' .
it is thought that the plane involved is a qatar airways airbus a330 and that the military plane is a typhoon from raf coningsby in lincolnshire .

Nothing suspicious on diverted plane, say police

Qatar Airways confirms possible device on board

14:30
Qatar Airways passenger arrested over suspected bomb hoax

bulletin.text: Military jets have escorted a passenger plane to Manchester Airport after reports of a possible device on board.
Full story: man arrested over hoax bomb threat on Manchester-bound plane.
